sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CMTBMALI( MALI_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), MALI_PART_NO VARCHAR(20), MALI_EONO VARCHAR(20), MALI_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0), MALI_METH_CODE CHAR(4), MALI_MOLD_SEQ0 NUMBER(3, 0), MALI_MOLD_CODE VARCHAR(7), MALI_SORT_KEY NUMBER(3, 0), MALI_DMOLD_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_LAST_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_ADEL_PRIC NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_TMOLD_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_MATL_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_PROC_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_GME0_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_PROF_COST NUMBER(18, 6), MALI_ITEM_CODE VARCHAR(8), MALI_PROD_WIDT NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_PROD_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_PROD_HEGT NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_SCOR_NUMB NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_EQUI_CODE VARCHAR(8), MALI_CORE_WIDT1 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_LENG1 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_HEGT1 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_CAVT1 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_WIDT2 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_LENG2 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_HEGT2 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_CAVT2 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_WIDT3 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_LENG3 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_HEGT3 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_CORE_CAVT3 NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_HARD_NDEGR VARCHAR(8), MALI_LHRH_CODE VARCHAR(8), MALI_LHRH_CODE1 VARCHAR(8), MALI_1PRO_GUBN VARCHAR(8), MALI_MOLD_LIFE NUMBER(10, 0), MALI_LIFE_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 0), MALI_ADEL_FACT NUMBER(10, 2), MALI_KIND_NNUMB NUMBER(2, 0), MALI_CAVT_NNUMB NUMBER(7, 0), MALI_MOLD_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 0), MALI_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), MALI_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), MALI_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), MALI_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), MALI_PROD_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 2), CONSTRAINT CMTBMALI_PK PRIMARY KEY ( MALI_CORP_CODE, MALI_PART_NO, MALI_EONO, MALI_CUMT_NO, MALI_METH_CODE, MALI_MOLD_SEQ0 ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORP_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PART_NO', 'VARCHAR', 20 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_EONO', 'VARCHAR', 20 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CUMT_NO', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_METH_CODE', 'CHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_MOLD_SEQ0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_MOLD_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 7 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_SORT_KEY', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_DMOLD_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_LAST_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_ADEL_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_TMOLD_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_MATL_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PROC_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_GME0_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PROF_COST', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_ITEM_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PROD_WIDT', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 19, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PROD_LENG', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 20, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PROD_HEGT', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 21, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_SCOR_NUMB', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 22, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_EQUI_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 23, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_WIDT1', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 24, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_LENG1', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 25, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_HEGT1', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 26, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_CAVT1', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 27, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_WIDT2', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 28, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_LENG2', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 29, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_HEGT2', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 30, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_CAVT2', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 31, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_WIDT3', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 32, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_LENG3', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 33, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_HEGT3', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 34, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CORE_CAVT3', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 35, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_HARD_NDEGR', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 36, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_LHRH_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 37, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_LHRH_CODE1', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 38, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_1PRO_GUBN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 39, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_MOLD_LIFE', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 40, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_LIFE_CNT0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 41, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_ADEL_FACT', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 42, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_KIND_NNUMB', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 43, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_CAVT_NNUMB', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 44, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_MOLD_CNT0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 45, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_UPDT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 46, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_UPDT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 47, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_INIT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 48, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_INIT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 49, 'CMTBMALI' , 'MALI_PROD_CNT0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'MALI_CORP_CODE', '법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'MALI_PART_NO', 'PART NO' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'MALI_EONO', 'EO NO' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'MALI_CUMT_NO', '계산번호' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'MALI_METH_CODE', '금형공법코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'MALI_MOLD_SEQ0', '금형코드 SEQ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'MALI_MOLD_CODE', '금형코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'MALI_SORT_KEY', '금형코드 정렬 순서' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'MALI_DMOLD_COST', '상각금형비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'MALI_LAST_COST', '결정금형비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'MALI_ADEL_PRIC', '조정금액' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'MALI_TMOLD_COST', '계산 금형비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'MALI_MATL_COST', '금형재료비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'MALI_PROC_COST', '금형가공비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'MALI_GME0_COST', '일반관리비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'MALI_PROF_COST', '이윤' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'MALI_ITEM_CODE', 'ITEM구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'MALI_PROD_WIDT', '제품가로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 19, 'MALI_PROD_LENG', '제품세로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 20, 'MALI_PROD_HEGT', '제품높이' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 21, 'MALI_SCOR_NUMB', 'S/CORE수' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 22, 'MALI_EQUI_CODE', '적용장비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 23, 'MALI_CORE_WIDT1', '중자1 가로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 24, 'MALI_CORE_LENG1', '중자1 세로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 25, 'MALI_CORE_HEGT1', '중자1 높이' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 26, 'MALI_CORE_CAVT1', '중자1 CAVT' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 27, 'MALI_CORE_WIDT2', '중자2 가로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 28, 'MALI_CORE_LENG2', '중자2 세로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 29, 'MALI_CORE_HEGT2', '중자2 높이' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 30, 'MALI_CORE_CAVT2', '중자2 CAVT' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 31, 'MALI_CORE_WIDT3', '중자3 가로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 32, 'MALI_CORE_LENG3', '중자3 세로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 33, 'MALI_CORE_HEGT3', '중자3 높이' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 34, 'MALI_CORE_CAVT3', '중자3 CAVT' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 35, 'MALI_HARD_NDEGR', '난이도' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 36, 'MALI_LHRH_CODE', 'LHD/RHD 금형구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 37, 'MALI_LHRH_CODE1', 'LH/RH 금형구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 38, 'MALI_1PRO_GUBN', '1호 금형계산구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 39, 'MALI_MOLD_LIFE', '금형수명' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 40, 'MALI_LIFE_CNT0', 'MODEL LIFE생산수량' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 41, 'MALI_ADEL_FACT', '조정계수' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 42, 'MALI_KIND_NNUMB', '벌수' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 43, 'MALI_CAVT_NNUMB', '제품CAVITY' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 44, 'MALI_MOLD_CNT0', '상각수량' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 45, 'MALI_UPDT_CMAN', '수정자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 46, 'MALI_UPDT_DATE', '수정일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 47, 'MALI_INIT_CMAN', '등록자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 48, 'MALI_INIT_DATE', '등록일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 49, 'MALI_PROD_CNT0', '생산수량' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( MALI_CORP_CODE ,MALI_PART_NO ,MALI_EONO ,MALI_CUMT_NO ,MALI_METH_CODE ,MALI_MOLD_SEQ0 ,MALI_MOLD_CODE ,MALI_SORT_KEY ,MALI_DMOLD_COST ,MALI_LAST_COST ,MALI_ADEL_PRIC ,MALI_TMOLD_COST ,MALI_MATL_COST ,MALI_PROC_COST ,MALI_GME0_COST ,MALI_PROF_COST ,MALI_ITEM_CODE ,MALI_PROD_WIDT ,MALI_PROD_LENG ,MALI_PROD_HEGT ,MALI_SCOR_NUMB ,MALI_EQUI_CODE ,MALI_CORE_WIDT1 ,MALI_CORE_LENG1 ,MALI_CORE_HEGT1 ,MALI_CORE_CAVT1 ,MALI_CORE_WIDT2 ,MALI_CORE_LENG2 ,MALI_CORE_HEGT2 ,MALI_CORE_CAVT2 ,MALI_CORE_WIDT3 ,MALI_CORE_LENG3 ,MALI_CORE_HEGT3 ,MALI_CORE_CAVT3 ,MALI_HARD_NDEGR ,MALI_LHRH_CODE ,MALI_LHRH_CODE1 ,MALI_1PRO_GUBN ,MALI_MOLD_LIFE ,MALI_LIFE_CNT0 ,MALI_ADEL_FACT ,MALI_KIND_NNUMB ,MALI_CAVT_NNUMB ,MALI_MOLD_CNT0 ,MALI_UPDT_CMAN ,MALI_UPDT_DATE ,MALI_INIT_CMAN ,MALI_INIT_DATE ,MALI_PROD_CNT0 ) AS ( #DATA_TEXT# ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MALI_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CMTBMALI B ON B.MALI_CORP_CODE = A.MALI_CORP_CODE AND B.MALI_PART_NO = A.MALI_PART_NO AND B.MALI_EONO = A.MALI_EONO AND B.MALI_CUMT_NO = A.MALI_CUMT_NO AND B.MALI_METH_CODE = A.MALI_METH_CODE AND B.MALI_MOLD_SEQ0 = A.MALI_MOLD_SEQ0
